newsitem.title: EGYPT: Egyptian Bourse closed for holiday.
newsitem.headline: Egyptian Bourse closed for holiday.

text.p: The Egyptian stock market was closed on Tuesday for Christmas after a seven-day streak of record highs.
The Capital Market Authority (CMA) all-share index closed on Monday at 324.78 points, up 2.34 points against Sunday's close. Volume was 50.37 million pounds ($14.81 million).
The CMAindex for openly traded firms also rose to 511.01 from 507.79 points on Sunday and the index for rarely traded "closed" firms rose to 222.32 from 220.6.
